snippet: The owners of the former Northfield Mount Hermon campus in Massachusetts want to donate the property to a Christian group; residents object to Liberty University as a candidate.
abstract: Owners of the former Northfield Mount Hermon campus in Massachusetts want to donate the historic property to a Christian group; residents object to Liberty University as a candidate, which was founded by the Rev Jerry Falwell; more than 1,000 alumni of Northfield sign petition calling Liberty an 'extremist' and 'homophobic' institution that clashes with the values of D L Moody, original owner of property.
lead_paragraph: The owners of the former Northfield Mount Hermon campus in Massachusetts want to donate the property to a Christian group; residents object to Liberty University as a candidate.

headline.seo: Possible Campus Donation to Liberty University Draws Petition
headline.main: Tension Over a Campus Gift, and a Potential Recipient
headline.print_headline: Community Weighs In On Campus Giveaway
